description:
LibreOffice is a free and powerful office suite, and a successor to OpenOffice.org (commonly known as OpenOffice). Its clean interface and feature-rich tools help you unleash your creativity and enhance your productivity.


The latest release of LibreOffice, recommended for technology enthusiasts, early adopters and power users, which contains new features and program enhancements. This version may contain a few annoying bugs which will be fixed in the next minor releases to come, although it is stable enough for most basic tasks.
LibreOffice 26.2.0 is the initial release of this line. For a list of fixed bugs compared to the previous development releases, see the list of bugs fixed in RC1, RC2 and RC3.
